resources.welcomePageSubtitle: Join wish lists for free and share in the fun!
resources.welcomePageBulletText1: Save, organize, and get feedback on products you're interested in.
resources.welcomePageBulletText2: Share your wish lists with family and friends and make shopping decisions together.
resources.welcomePageBulletText3: Use wish lists to discover and discuss gifts.  Never buy the wrong gift again!
resources.uniqueNameMsg: The wish list name must be unique.
resources.spaceCreatedSuccessMsg: Success! Your wish list has been created.
resources.spaceEditSuccessMsg: Your wish list settings have been saved.
resources.spaceEditFailureMsg: Error! You have an error. Please fix and try again.
resources.privacySettingsDescription: Inviting friends to a private wish list will change your privacy setting to Group. Sending a private or group wish list by email or sharing it on a social network will make it a shared list.
resources.privacySharedLabel: Anyone with a link can see this list. Only you and people you invite can see, comment, and add to this list.
resources.privacyGroupLabel: Only you and people you invite can see, comment, and add to this list.
resources.privacyPrivateLabel: Only you can see and add to this list.
resources.privacyPrivateOptDisabledText: The wish list has members and cannot be set to Private. Please remove the members and try again.
resources.uploadProfileImgMaxSizeError: Please upload an image smaller than 10 MB.
resources.uploadProfileImgFileTypeError: Please upload a JPG, PNG, or GIF file.
resources.uploadProfileImgError: There was problem uploading your image. Please try again.
resources.uploadProfileImgSuccess: Your profile image has been updated.
resources.deleteConfirmMessageText: Are you sure you want to delete this wish list?
resources.spaceDeleteSuccessMsg: Success! Your wish list was deleted.
resources.spaceDeleteLastSpaceSuccessMsg: Success! Your remaining wish list was deleted. A new wish list was automatically created for you.
resources.spaceDeleteErrorMsg: The wish list was not deleted.
resources.setProfileImageError: An error has occurred while changing your user profile image.
resources.spaceNotFound: The wish list you are trying to view was not found.
resources.inviteSpaceModalWarningText: Inviting friends will change the privacy setting from Private to Group. This allows friends to become members of your wish list, add products, and comment. You can change the privacy setting and add or remove members anytime.
resources.inviteSpaceModalInfoText: Inviting friends allows friends to become members of your wish list, add products, and comment. You can add or remove members anytime.
resources.spaceInviteRecipientsTypeText: Recipients (separate email addresses with a comma or semicolon)
resources.inviteClientEmailBodyIntro: Join my __wishlistName__ wish list so we can shop together!
resources.inviteClientEmailBodyIntroItem1: Make comments and give feedback on products in my wish list.
resources.inviteClientEmailBodyIntroItem2: Add items to my wish list that you think I might be interested in.
resources.inviteClientEmailBodyIntroItem3: Create your own wish lists to save and organize products you want to buy.
resources.emailRecipientsRequired: Please type in at least one recipient email address.
resources.recipientsCountLimitMsg: Please limit the number of your recipients to 10.
resources.recipientsInvalidAddressMsg: Please enter valid email addresses for your recipients separated by commas or semicolons.
resources.invitationsSentSuccessMsg: Success! Your invitations are scheduled for delivery.
resources.generalUnrecoverableErrorMsg: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
resources.shareConvertPrivateMsg1: Sharing your wish list will change its privacy setting to Shared.  This means people with a link can view your wish list.  You can change the privacy setting anytime.
resources.inviteMembersText: Invite friends to add members, so they can give you advice and feedback!
resources.removeMembersFailureText: There was a problem removing members from the wish list.  Please refresh your browser and try again.
resources.removeMembersConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove these members?  They will no longer have access to your wish list.
resources.leaveConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this wish list?  You will not have access to the wish list unless re-invited by owner.
resources.leaveSpaceSuccessMessage: You are no longer a member of the wish list.
resources.leaveSpaceAlreadyRemovedMessage: You are not a member of the wish list.
resources.leaveSpaceNotExistMessage: The wish list has been deleted.
resources.leaveSpaceFailureMessage: There was a problem removing you from the wish list.  Please try again.
resources.fbInviteMessage: Join __ownername__'s wish list for free and join in the fun!
resources.editWishlistPrivateTooltipTxt: Currently only you can see and interact with this list.
resources.editWishlistGroupTooltipTxt: Currently only you and invited members can see and interact with this list.
resources.editWishlistSharedTooltipTxt: Currently anyone with a link can see this list. Only you and invited members can interact with the list.
resources.inviteFriendsTooltipTxt: Invite friends so they can interact
resources.inviteFriendsPrivateTooltipTxt: Invite friends so they can interact. If you do, this becomes a group wish list.
resources.spaceCreateMaxSpacesMsg: Problem creating wish list. You have exceeded the limit for the number of wish lists. Please delete an existing wish list before creating a new one.
